title: How to Make a Peanut Butter Milkshake Without Ice Cream

steps.headline: Gather your ingredients and needed items.
Mix in ice cubes, peanut butter, and milk.
Add sugar.
steps.description: Taste and test as you go to decide how much you think you need.

steps.headline: Blend the ingredients.
steps.description: Feel free to add and change your product; it's not finished until you like it.

steps.headline: Serve your finished product as you like it.
steps.description: Feel free to top it off with some whipped cream or a cherry.

text: Gather your ingredients and needed items.  Mix in ice cubes, peanut butter, and milk. Mix well. Add sugar. Taste and test as you go to decide how much you think you need. Blend the ingredients. Feel free to add and change your product; it's not finished until you like it. Serve your finished product as you like it. Feel free to top it off with some whipped cream or a cherry.
sentences: Gather your ingredients and needed items.
Mix in ice cubes, peanut butter, and milk.
Taste and test as you go to decide how much you think you need.
Feel free to add and change your product; it's not finished until you like it.
Serve your finished product as you like it.
Feel free to top it off with some whipped cream or a cherry.
